ClaimId__c.description: ID of the claim that this record is related to.

Name__c.description: Name of the claim provider record.

Provider__c.description: ID of the provider that this record is related to.

Role__c.description: Indicates whether the provider is the rendering provider, service provider, or billing provider.

SourceSystem__c.description: Name of the system that this record was sourced from.

SourceSystemIdentifier__c.description: ID of the system that this record was sourced from.

SourceSystemModified__c.description: Timestamp of the the most recent update from the source system.
